    • 构造器详细资料

      • ExcelParseUtils

        public ExcelParseUtils(java.lang.String filepath,
               java.lang.String fileName)
        class construct with initlize to set filename for excel file operations.
        参数:
        fileName - the excel file name with whole path

      • ExcelParseUtils

        public ExcelParseUtils(java.lang.String subFolder)
        class construct with initlize to set filename for excel file operations.
        参数:
        subFolder - the excel file path under public file path, named testdata.xls

    • 方法详细资料

      • setExcelValue

        public void setExcelValue(java.lang.String sheetName,
                 int row,
                 int col,
                 java.lang.String value)
        write excel sheet, specified value to specified cell.
        notice : you can use this method to set cell value both in xls and xlsx,
        but when xlsx you must use dom4j.jar, otherwise there is a ClassNotFoundException
        参数:
        sheetName - excel sheet name
        row - row index which to be changed
        col - column index which to be changed
        value - value to be put into cell
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • getExcelValue

        public java.lang.String getExcelValue(java.lang.String sheetName,
                             int row,
                             int col)
        get excel cell value of specified cell.
        notice : you can use this method to set cell value both in xls and xlsx,
        but when xlsx you must use dom4j.jar, otherwise there is a ClassNotFoundException
        参数:
        sheetName - excel sheet name
        row - row index which to be changed
        col - column index which to be changed
        返回:
        excel cell value string
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • creatMap

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> creatMap(java.util.List<java.lang.String> keys,
                                                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> parms)
        put data into map.
        参数:
        keys - map key names
        parms - map key values
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • excelToList

        public java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> excelToList(java.lang.String sheetName)
        read excel Xls and add the result into arraylist.
        参数:
        sheetName - excel sheet name
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • excelDataMap

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> excelDataMap(java.lang.String sheetName,
                                                            int index)
        get the specified excel Xls sheet with specified row data into map.
        参数:
        sheetName - excel sheet name
        index - index of the row you want to use
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • excelDataMap

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> excelDataMap(java.lang.String sheetName)
        override the excelDataMapXls method, using default rownum 1.
        参数:
        sheetName - excel sheet name
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException
